name: BobDiBob Multiplayer Tower Defense
description:
BobDiBob Is a local couch co-op multiplayer Tower Defense. Can only be played with controllers. 4 Players recommended but less or more is also possible. Good luck!

Gather resources in your base to spawn minions. Minions will automatically walk towards the enemy base. Each animal has their own unique features, and they can also be found in the wild. Play as a team and try to create as much chaos for your enemy. 


Defend by picking up minions and using them as weapons with (Right Trigger) or Place them as towers. Place and Pickup towers to create a strategic advantage.


Controls:

  • A: Confirm
  • B: Cancel
  • X : Interact, Place/Pickup Tower, Place/Pickup Minion, Harvest
  • Y: Pickup/Drop Item
  • Right Trigger: Shoot

By Couch Dog Games
